desc: Woman-owned small business since 2021. Cruelty-free, handmade scented candles with crackling woodwicks. Ethically-sourced crystals. Energetically charged Moonwater. Organic cold-pressed face oils. And so much more. All made in NY with love.

layout.text:
Woman-owned small business since 2021.
Cruelty-free, handmade scented candles with crackling woodwicks.
Ethically-sourced crystals.
Healing wellness & beauty products,
And so much more.
All made in NY with love.✨
